text: my wife and I have a thirteen-year-old
son together his name is Taryn Taryn
with a t t er R a and he's named after
two of my brothers Terry in there and my
wife let me pick that name out and we're
still fighting about it there's not a
common name for a little boy we can't
find a license plate for his bicycle I
said if he takes it after my brother's
he'll be making his own license plate
that's a whole nother show right there
there is 13 years old I came in off the
road he said he wanted he said he wanted
some air Jordan I didn't know what this
was at the time turns out it's a tennis
shoe here this is the Air Jordan I said
okay that's why why do you want that he
said because they make you jump higher
and I took him to the mall $180
I jumped that high right there that
little boy got everything in the world
Nintendo PlayStation PlayStation 4 Xbox
Xbox Kinect he got everything man and
that's what kids today had I just got
him to smarten his first smartphone he's
13 we didn't think he'd really needed
the smartphone but with my wife and I
figured if we got him one he could teach
me and my wife how to use ours and he
got it taken away the first day back at
school because he got caught texting his
girlfriends I had to go to the school to
pick up his phone and we're driving back
home and he looked at me he said didn't
you ever get your phone taken away while
you were in school
because anybody in here is my age or
older if you would have wanted to take
my phone you would have had to come to
my house come in my kitchen and rip it
off the wall that my son goes well what
did you do for self-service we had that
long cord that would reach into every
room of the house that was it well how
did you text your girlfriend's we wrote
him out on a piece of paper and then we
folded them up we handed it to him
hoping we wouldn't get caught then we
spent 10 minutes watching them trying to
open it
[Laughter]
